languages.text: {n}Изумрудные глаза, сияющее спокойствием и решимостью, обращены лишь к вам.{/n} "Когда Путь, по которому следовала моя потерянная душа, уходил из-под ног, рассыпался, вязнул в сомнениях... Ты всегда был{mf||а} рядом, элантах. Несмотря на то, как ненавидел меня твой вид. Невзирая на то, что творили мои собратья. Пришло время отплатить тебе тем же".

{n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."
languages.original_text: {n}Изумрудные глаза, сияющее спокойствием и решимостью, обращены лишь к вам.{/n} "Когда Путь, по которому следовала моя потерянная душа, уходил из-под ног, рассыпался, вязнул в сомнениях... Ты всегда был{mf||а} рядом, элантах. Несмотря на то, как ненавидел меня твой вид. Невзирая на то, что творили мои собратья. Пришло время отплатить тебе тем же".

You always were close, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kinsmen were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

You always were close, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kinsmen were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

{n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你，翠绿色的眼睛中闪烁着平静的决心。{/n}“我迷失的灵魂所追寻的道途，曾在我脚下破碎、粉碎，我曾陷入过怀疑之中……但你一直都在我身边，外界人。哪怕你再怎么痛恨我的同族，哪怕我的族人做了那样的事情，你也没有离开过我。如今，是时候轮到我报答你了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特看着你，翠绿色的眼睛中闪烁着平静的决心。{/n}“我迷失的灵魂所追寻的道途，曾在我脚下破碎、粉碎，我曾陷入过怀疑之中……但你一直都在我身边，外界人。哪怕你再怎么痛恨我的同族，哪怕我的族人做了那样的事情，你也没有离开过我。如今，是时候轮到我报答你了。”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet te mira, y sus ojos esmeralda brillan con una determinación silenciosa.{/n} «Cuando la Senda que mi alma perdida seguía se desmoronó bajo mis pies, destrozada, y me arrojó a la duda... siempre estuviste ahí, elantach. A pesar de lo mucho que detestabas a mi especie. A pesar de los actos de mis hermanos. Es hora de que te devuelva esa confianza».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet te mira, y sus ojos esmeralda brillan con una determinación silenciosa.{/n} «Cuando la Senda que mi alma perdida seguía se desmoronó bajo mis pies, destrozada, y me arrojó a la duda... siempre estuviste ahí, elantach. A pesar de lo mucho que detestabas a mi especie. A pesar de los actos de mis hermanos. Es hora de que te devuelva esa confianza».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめる。そのエメラルドの瞳は静かな決意で輝いている。{/n}「我の空っぽの魂が辿っていた道が足元から崩れ落ち、粉々になり、疑心暗鬼に陥ったとき…お前はいつもそこにいたな、エランタ。我が種族を心の底から嫌悪していたのに。我が同胞がお前にひどいことをしたにも関わらず。今こそお恩返しをすべき時だろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはあなたを見つめる。そのエメラルドの瞳は静かな決意で輝いている。{/n}「我の空っぽの魂が辿っていた道が足元から崩れ落ち、粉々になり、疑心暗鬼に陥ったとき…お前はいつもそこにいたな、エランタ。我が種族を心の底から嫌悪していたのに。我が同胞がお前にひどいことをしたにも関わらず。今こそお恩返しをすべき時だろう」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich an. In ihren smaragdgrünen Augen leuchtet stille Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Als der Pfad, dem meine verlorene Seele folgte, unter meinen Füßen bröckelte, einbrach, mich in Zweifel stürzte ... wart Ihr immer da, Elantach. Trotz Eures abgrundtiefen Hasses gegenüber meinesgleichen. Trotz allem, was mein Volk getan hat. Es ist an der Zeit, dass ich mich revanchiere."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet blickt dich an. In ihren smaragdgrünen Augen leuchtet stille Entschlossenheit.{/n} "Als der Pfad, dem meine verlorene Seele folgte, unter meinen Füßen bröckelte, einbrach, mich in Zweifel stürzte ... wart Ihr immer da, Elantach. Trotz Eures abgrundtiefen Hasses gegenüber meinesgleichen. Trotz allem, was mein Volk getan hat. Es ist an der Zeit, dass ich mich revanchiere."

languages.text: {n}Le regard émeraude d'Yrliet se pose sur vous avec une détermination sereine.{/n} « Quand la Voie que suivait mon âme égarée s'est effondrée sous mes pieds et que j'ai sombré dans les affres du doute, vous étiez là, à mes côtés. Malgré la haine que vous vouez à mon peuple. Malgré les erreurs commises par les miens. L'heure est venue pour moi de vous rendre la pareille. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le regard émeraude d'Yrliet se pose sur vous avec une détermination sereine.{/n} « Quand la Voie que suivait mon âme égarée s'est effondrée sous mes pieds et que j'ai sombré dans les affres du doute, vous étiez là, à mes côtés. Malgré la haine que vous vouez à mon peuple. Malgré les erreurs commises par les miens. L'heure est venue pour moi de vous rendre la pareille. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, durgun bir kararlılıkla parlayan zümrüt gözleriyle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Kayıp ruhumun tutturduğu Yol ayaklarımın altında parçalanırken, dağılırken, beni şüpheye sürüklerken sen hep oradaydın elantach. Türümden ne kadar nefret ediyor olsan da. Soydaşlarım ne yapıyor olurlarsa olsunlar. Sana bunun karşılığını vermemin zamanı geldi."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet looks at you, her emerald eyes shining with quiet determination.{/n} "When the Path my lost soul was following crumbled beneath my feet, shattered, plunged me into doubt... you were always there, elantach. Despite how much you hated my kind. Despite what my kin were doing. It is time for me to repay you in kind."
